original: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyatas trayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ cakṣuṣ[56] tadbhūmikaṃ kāmāvacarāṇi paśyataḥ kāyavijñāne svabhūmike rūpāṇy adharāṇi cakṣuś ca tadbhūmikam dvitīyadhyānabhūmini paśyataś cakṣūrūpe tadbhūmike śeṣaṃ svabhūmikam evaṃ tṛtīyādidhyānacakṣuṣā yojyam dvitīyādidhyānopapannasya svaparacakṣurbhyāṃ svaparabhūmikāni rūpāṇi 5 paśyato yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam ayaṃ tu niyamaḥ na kāyasyādharaṃ cakṣuḥ pañcabhūmikāni hi kāyacakṣurūpāṇi kāmāvacarāṇi yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāni dvibhūmikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ10 ca tatra yadbhūmikaḥ kāyas tadbhūmikaṃ cakṣur ūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā cakṣur bhavati na tv adharabhūmikam yadbhūmikaṃ cakṣus tadbhūmikam adharabhūmikaṃ vā rūpaṃ [28a]viṣayo bhavati ūrdhvaṃ rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣaḥ na hi kadācid ūrdhvabhūmikaṃ rūpam adhobhūmikena cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ śakyate vijñānaṃ ca ūrdhvaṃ na cakṣuṣo rūpavat asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ 46 asyety anantaroktasya cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ sarvato viṣaya ūrdhvam adhaḥ svabhūmau ca kāyasyobhe rūpavijñāne sarvato bhavataḥ yathā cedaṃ cakṣur uktaṃ vistareṇa veditavyaṃ tathā śrotram "na kāyasyādharaṃ śrotram ūrdhvaṃ śabdo na ca śruteḥ vijñānaṃ cāsya śabdas tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ" iti vistareṇa yojyam trayāṇāṃ tu sarvam eva svabhūmikam ghrāṇajihvākāyadhātūnāṃ kāyasvaviṣayavijñānāni svabhūmikāny eva ity[57] utsargaviśeṣeṇa kṛtvā punar viśeṣanārtham apavāda ārabhyate/
analyzed: dvitīya dhyāna cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ trayam sva bhūmikam tad bhūmikam kāmāvacarāṇi paśyataḥ kāya vijñāne sva bhūmike rūpāṇi adharāṇi cakṣuḥ ca tad bhūmikam dvitīya dhyāna bhūmini paśyataḥ cakṣuḥ rūpe tad bhūmike śeṣam sva bhūmikam evam tṛtīya ādi dhyāna cakṣuṣā yojyam dvitīya ādi dhyāna upapannasya sva para cakṣurbhyām sva para bhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ yathāyogam yojayitavyam ayam tu niyamaḥ na kāyasya adharam ca
